'''Light and Dark, Dusk and Dawn''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach the top of the [[Dainichi Mikoshi]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* This achievement is typically earned during ''[[Hyperion's Dirge (Quest)|Hyperion's Dirge]],'' which adds a [[Phase Gate]] that quickly brings the player to the top of the Dainichi Mikoshi. However, it can be obtained before completing this quest if the player manually reaches the top.
